answers.answer: You're on the right path and continue to do so to bring your glucose levels further downward. Add moderate exercise to your plan, like walking.

question: Hi, in the same boat. Recently diagnosed with diabetes.  My numbers were extremely high over 400, but after 2 weeks on medication, and totally changing my eating habits and nutrition, reduced over 200 points.   jerryQUESTION: Any suggestions to help me as I go on with diabetes will be helpful and appreciated.This discussion is related to/posts/show/719105.
title: diabetes help
